name: Dream Adventure(Hand Tracking)
summary:
Welcome to our dream world!

Prepare yourself to face a wide variety of enemies in thrilling battles! Unleash your arsenal of hand gesture weapons and engage in exhilarating combat with them! Victory is destined for the brave warriors!

In this game, you have access to over forty weapons that can be recognized through hand gestures. Each weapon has its own unique characteristics. You can freely switch between different types of guns, knives, scepters, bows and arrows, magic orbs, and more. You can also...
